      • getMultiplier

        public double getMultiplier(int moves)
        Calculates a reasonable multiplier, that is needed to calculate the overall points of one quiz round.
        Parameters:
        moves - The amount of moves with which the user finished the memory.
        Returns:
        Returns multiplier.

      • fromDBgetRandomCards

        public java.util.LinkedList<MemoryFactory.Card> fromDBgetRandomCards()
                                                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Defines the SQL query and calls the executing method fromDBgetCards(String query).
        Returns:
        Returns a list of ten card objects that were randomly selected out of the database table memory_img.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if query is not valid.

      • fromDBgetCards

        private java.util.LinkedList<MemoryFactory.Card> fromDBgetCards(java.lang.String query)
                                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Connects to database and executes the passed SQL query. Creates card objects using the received data from the database.
        Parameters:
        query - The passed SQL query.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of card objects.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if query is not valid.
